sentences.sContent: He dived below the surface of the water.
Please do not write below this line.
sentences.sCn: 请不要写到这条线下面。

sentences.sContent: ...some measures mentioned below are the most important aspects that we should take into consideration...

synos.tran: 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面

trans.tranOther: at or to a lower level or position than sb/sth
